thread.title: Brunel's bridge closes for maintenance work
thread.title_full: Brunel's bridge closes for maintenance work | West Country (E) - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Brunel's bridge closes for maintenance work
text:
Clifton Suspension Bridge will be closed during the day until Friday Credit: ITV News Clifton Suspension Bridge in Bristol will be closed this week between 9.30 and 4 pm for maintenance work.
It's part of the restoration of one of the Towers, which includes repointing the walls and removing scaffolding. Pedestrians will still be able to cross.
The closures are necessary to allow the completion of the restoration work to the Clifton tower, which has been ongoing through the summer.
The masonry has been cleaned and repointed, and repairs carried out to the roof structure, the drainage and the access ladders.
The final stages include the repointing of the walls facing the roadway, and the removal of the scaffolding where it spans across the road.
â€“ Bridge Master David Anderson There will be a signed diversion, using Bridge Valley Road, Brunel Way and A369 Rownham Hill.
Last updated Mon 21 Sep 2015 Travel Clifton Suspension Bridge Bristol
